name: Zven Balslev / Claus Ejner - 24 Linoliumstryk
description: · Apx. 455 € · Dimensions: A5 · PLEASE NOTE: Limited to a very small edition of 10!!! · A unique collaboration between Zven Balslev and Claus Ejner who created 24 linocuts in 8 hours · Signed, numbered and of cause hand printed by the artists English Zven Balslev (b. 1977) is a graphic artist, cartoonist, musician and painter based in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is a graduate from The Danish National Academy of Art, and is internationally known for his work with the notorious and now defunct danish publishing house SMITTEKILDE. Zven works with drawing and various graphic techniques such as silkscreen, print, lino-cut, ink and white-out collages. His drawings have appeared on countless posters, flyer's and record covers in the Copenhagen underground, and in magazines like Mollüsk (Bongoût), Hopital Brut, The Sound Projector and La Commissure, among others. Dansk Zven Balslev er dansk grafisk designer, tegnerserietegner, musiker og maler. Han er uddannet fra Det Kongelige Danske Kunstakademi, og er internationalt anerkendt for sit arbejde med det notoriske og nu lukkede forlag SMITTEKILDE. Zven arbejder med tegning og forskellige grafiske teknikker såsom silketryk, linoleumstryk, blæk og collager. Hans tegninge har figureret på utallige plakater, flyers og pladecovers i den københavnske undergrund, i magasiner som bla. Mollüsk(Bongoût), Hospital Brut, The sound Projector and La Commissure. Cult Pump Blog Claus Ejner Website

name: Morten Løfberg - Toucan
description: · One color copper line etching on handmade Somerset, 300 gsm acid free paper. · Paper size app: 34 cm x 40 cm · Image size: 27,5 cm x 19,5 cm · Black toucan = Edition of 8 · Printed at Schäfers Grafiske Værksted, Copenhagen. · Signed and numbered by the artist. DK Kunstner og illustrator Morten Løfberg er uddannet serigraf og studerer på Medie- og Journalisthøjskolen i København. Han har illustreret flere bøger og er fast tilknyttet adskillige forlag i norden. Kuglepennen samt en betydelig portion humor, er de vigtigeste remedier i skabelsen af Løfbergs værker. Kuglepennens fine streger går godt i spænd med kobberraderingens tidskrævende håndværksmæssige udfordringer. Løfberg er desuden medstifter af det grafiske værksted Wood-cut. samt initiativtager til Goodbones - en årlig censureret udstilling for unge. UK Artist and illustrator Morten Løfberg is a trained screen printer and a student at The Danish School of Media and Journalism. He has illustrated quite a few books and is working on a regular basis with several Nordic publishers. Morten is using ballpoint pens as his primary tool and humour as the driving visual force, when working with his art. The use of ballpoint pens is translating perfectly to the demanding and time consuming work of a copper line etching. Further more Løfberg is the brain behind Goodbones - an annual censored exhibition for young artists and he is co-founder of Wood-cut, art printshop. Løfberg website

name: HuskMitNavn - The big Escape
description: · Apx. 470 € · 2 color lithography on handmade, 300 gsm acid free paper. · Year 2013 · 70 cm x 100 cm · Edition of 100 · Signed and numbered by the artist DK HuskMitNavn har med sin humoristiske, kontroversielle og politiske street-art sat sit præg på både den danske og internationale kunstscene . Hans karakteristiske figurer og kommentarer er spredt over hele Europa og dækker over alt fra street-art og graffiti i det offentlige rum, illustrationer for internationale magasiner og aviser til udstillinger i gallerier og store bygningsdekorationer. UK HuskMitNavn (RememberMyName) lives and works in Copenhagen, Denmark. With his controversial, humorous and political street-art he has made his mark on both the Danish and the international art scene. His characteristic characters and comments are spread all over Europe and covers a wide area, from street-art and graffiti in public space, illustrations in international magazines and newspapers to established settings such as galleries and building adornments. www.huskmitnavn.dk

name: Jan S. Hansen - JSH3
description: · Apx 536,00 € · 5 color litography on heavyweight archival paper · 37,5 x 51,5 cm · Edition of 24 · Signed, stamped and numbered English Jan S. Hansen is a Danish born artist. He graduated from The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts in Copenhagen in the summer of 2010, where he was honoured with the Blix award. Jan works with painting, drawing, photo, collage and music. His work is a clash of ideas and visuals merged with fragmented poetry. With an off-beat humor and open riddling writings the works of Jan S. Hansen invites the viewer to participate through personal interpretation. Dansk Jan S. Hansen er uddannet fra det Kongelige Danske Kunstakademi i København, som han afsluttede i 2010, hvor han også modtog Blix prisen. Jan arbejder med oliemaling, tegning, fotografi og musik. Hans værker befinder sig i krydsfeltet mellem ideer, visuals og fragmenteret poesi. Med en off-beat humor og gådefulde skriverier opfordrer Jan S. Hansens værker beskueren til at deltage gennem en helt personlig fortolkning. www.janshansen.com

name: Parker Ito - America Online Made Me Hardcore
description: · Apx 174,00 € · 6 color screen print on heavyweight archival paper · 70 cm x 50 cm · Edition of 50 · Year 2013 · Signed and numbered by the artist · The edition was made as a part of Parker Ito's Show at IMO-Projects: "The Net Artist (America Online Made Me Hardcore) in spring 2013. About Parker Ito doesn’t believe in net artists. “I’m not an Internet artist,” Ito said. “I’m just a hipster on the Internet who makes art.” Clearly, the 26-year old Los Angeles-based contemporary doesn’t like to think of his art as merely a product of his environment. Ito is difficult to define. There’s Parker Ito the professional, a self-described YIBA (Young Internet-Based Artist) who has achieved wide success and distinction in the art world for his paintings and exhibition projects that explore how the Internet affects traditional art objects. There’s Parker Ito the Internet persona, a genuine and irreverently funny character who can out-wear Hamish Bowles in a dandy pant suit and tweets whatever the fuck is on his mind. And of course, Parker Cheeto the Net Artist, an enigmatic alter ego symbolic of Ito’s evolution as an artist. At the core of these dimensions is a dynamic play between art, persona, and the power of self representation online — ideas that just as much characterize the essence of his conceptual practice as they do mystify it. www.parkerito.com/

name: Hvass & Hannibal - Interior
description: · Apx. 107,00 € · One colour photogravure print on Zerkall 745, 340gsm acid free paper. · Paper size app: 25 cm x 34 cm   · Image size: 16,8 cm x 16,8 cm · Edition of 20 · Printed by Hvass&Hannibal in Bjarne Agerbo Atelier in Copenhagen.  · Signed and numbered by the artists. English Hvass&Hannibal is a multi-disciplinary arts and design studio based in Copenhagen. Since 2006, its founders, Nan Na Hvass & Sofie Hannibal have worked in close collaborative partnership with illustrative and conceptual design in a number of different fields for numerous clients in Europe, Asia and the US. Whether in the digital realm or on a three-dimensional scale, the studio takes projects from esoteric illustrative beginnings to a full art direction and graphic design solution, all in-house. As well as being image makers they have also directed high profile photographic projects, and created sets and costumes for amongst others, one of Denmark's famous musical successes of recent years – Efterklang. Dansk Hvass&Hannibal er et multidisciplinært kunst og designstudio, der residerer I København. Siden 2006 har grundlæggerne, Nan Na Hvass & Sofie Hannibal, arbejdet tæt sammen om illustrationer og conceptuelt design for en bred vifte af kunder fra både Europa, Asien og USA. Uanset om opgaverne er indenfor det digitale område eller på en tre-dimensional skala, løfter Hvass&Hannibal dem gennem hele processen, fra esoterisk skitse til komplet grafisk design løsning. Ud over deres arbejde som imagedesignere har Hvass&Hannibal styret højprofilerede fotoprojekter samt skabt scenografi og kostumer for blandt andre det danske successband Efterklang. www.hvasshannibal.dk

name: Susann Pönisch - Strichorgie
description: · Apx. 389 € · Etching on 300 gsm acid free archival paper. · 50 cm x 50 cm · Very limited edition of 5 · Signed and numbered by the artist UK Susann Pönisch was born in 1979 and grew up in Berlin, Germany, where she lives today. In 2005 she began to screen and print her own drawings at the "Fleischerei", a free workspace for screen printing at the Rosenthaler Platz in Berlin. Since then screen-printing became her favourite technique. Today Pönisch produces her prints by drawing directly on transparent paper using several different techniques and tools, like acrylic paint, auqarell, coal, fineliner and many more. Pönischs prints are based on these drawings and there are no digital tools involved in producing the prints. DK Susann Poenisch blev født i 1979 i Berlin, hvor hun bor den dag i dag. I 2005 begyndte hun at trykke og printe sine tegninger på det frie arbejdsrum for print og tryk 'Fleischeri' på Rosenthaler Platz i Berlin. Siden har silketryk været hendes fortrukne teknik. Pönisch producerer sine tryk helt uden digitale værktøjer. Ved at tegne direkte på transparent papir, med en bred vifte af redskaber såsom akryl, akvarel, kul og mange flere, opnår hun en helt særlig stil. www.susannpoenisch.blogspot.com

name: Strid - Blue/Red
description: · Apx. 107,00 € · Giclée print on heavy weight archival paper. · 40 cm x 50 cm · Edition of 200 · Signed and numbered by the artist · Furthermore, Strid has personalized each print by drawing a little original sketch on each and every one of them. You could be tempted to think these prints were only for the childrens bedroom, and you couldn't be more wrong. The quality and originality of each print makes the STRID series of drawings a collectors item, bringing colour and sophistication to any wall. Jakob Martin Strid is a hugely popular cartoonist born in 1972 in Denmark. From the outset Strid – as he is commonly known – has worked as a cartoonist and had his break-through with the general public, when he was syndicated in a daily strip entitled ‘Strid’ in the national newspaper Politiken. The strip’s main character’s diminutive body and large head with spiky hair is a cartoon version of himself. His satirical talent quickly ensured Strid a reputation as a controversial cartoonist. Strid’s anti-authoritarian, humorous, and poetic blend were reflected in his children’s books, though in a form that was less abrasive. Here his political satire was transformed in to an anarchistic, humorous tale with great sympathy for strangers and the outsiders. With the picture book Little Frog (2005), Jakob Martin Strid won a picture book competition sponsored by the largest Danish publishing house, Gyldendal. The book went on to win the BØFA (a children’s librarians’ group) Cultural Honorary Award. www.strid.dk

name: Mikkel Møller (Dais) - Drawing with Sally 18
description: · Apx 160,00 € · Pen, Pencil and Marker on 130 g/m2 drawing paper · 40 cm x 30 cm · Original artwork · Signed by the artist · This work is part of a series of drawings, that Mikkel Møller did experimenting with different kinds of contrasts in strokes. In this particularly series, 1 year old Sally participated in her own unique way. English Mikkel Møller has a background in the Danish graffiti and street-art scene. But unlike the norm of this particular type of artist, he does not intend to establish a permanent and easily recognizable style. Quite contrary, He is much more inspired by expanding and combining different categories in his often conceptual and idea based approach. www.dais.dk Dansk Mikkel Møller har baggrund i graffiti og street-art miljøet. Han bliver langt mere inspireret af at forsøge at udvide og blande kategorierne i hans ofte konceptuelle og idébårne tilgang til værkerne. www.dais.dk

name: Susann Pönisch - Neon Forest
description: · Apx. 121 € · 4 colour screen print on card stock · 59 cm x 39,50 cm · Edition of 9 · Signed and numbered by the artist UK Susann Pönisch was born in 1979 and grew up in Berlin, Germany, where she lives today. In 2005 she began to print her own drawings at the "Fleischerei", a free workspace for screen printing at the Rosenthaler Platz in Berlin. Since then screen-printing became her favorite technique. Today Pönisch produces her prints by drawing directly on transparent paper using several different techniques and tools, like acrylic paint, auqarell, coal, fineliner and many more. Pönischs prints are based on these drawings and there are no digital tools involved in producing the prints. DK Susann Poenisch blev født i 1979 i Berlin, hvor hun bor den dag i dag. I 2005 begyndte hun at trykke og printe sine tegninger på det frie arbejdsrum for print og tryk 'Fleischeri' på Rosenthaler Platz i Berlin. Siden har silketryk været hendes fortrukne teknik. Pönisch producerer sine tryk helt uden digitale værktøjer. Ved at tegne direkte på transparent papir, med en bred vifte af redskaber såsom akryl, akvarel, kul og mange flere, opnår hun en helt særlig stil. www.susannpoenisch.blogspot.com

name: Strid - Round/Green
description: · Apx. 107,00 € · Giclée print on heavy weight archival paper. · 40 cm x 50 cm · Edition of 200 · Signed and numbered by the artist · Furthermore, Strid has personalized each print by drawing a little original sketch on each and every one of them. You could be tempted to think these prints were only for the childrens bedroom, and you couldn't be more wrong. The quality and originality of each print makes the STRID series of drawings a collectors item, bringing colour and sophistication to any wall. Jakob Martin Strid is a hugely popular cartoonist born in 1972 in Denmark. From the outset Strid – as he is commonly known – has worked as a cartoonist and had his break-through with the general public, when he was syndicated in a daily strip entitled ‘Strid’ in the national newspaper Politiken. The strip’s main character’s diminutive body and large head with spiky hair is a cartoon version of himself. His satirical talent quickly ensured Strid a reputation as a controversial cartoonist. Strid’s anti-authoritarian, humorous, and poetic blend were reflected in his children’s books, though in a form that was less abrasive. Here his political satire was transformed in to an anarchistic, humorous tale with great sympathy for strangers and the outsiders. With the picture book Little Frog (2005), Jakob Martin Strid won a picture book competition sponsored by the largest Danish publishing house, Gyldendal. The book went on to win the BØFA (a children’s librarians’ group) Cultural Honorary Award. www.strid.dk

name: Silas Inoue - Ouros Bouros
description: · Apx. 120 € · 1 color woodcut on heavyweight archival paper. · Dimensions: 38 cm x55 cm. · Signed, numbered and hand printed by the artist. Om kunstneren Silas Inoues virke omfatter tegning, maleri, poesi, skulptur og installation. Det er ofte interessen for det spirituelle og det ukendte som er udgangspunktet for hans værker. Herfra udvikler værkerne sig i forskellige retninger i en arbejdsproces dedikeret til både intuition og en kontemplativ fordybelse i materialet. Silas Inoue (f. 1981 i Danmark) bor og arbejder i København. Han er uddannet MA i Visuel Kommunikation fra Kunstakademiets Designskole i 2010, med udvekslingsophold ved Jan Matejki, Academy of Fine Art, Krakow i 2009 og ved Osaka University, Faculty og Art & Design, Japan i 2008. About the artist Silas Inoue´s oeuvre includes drawing, painting, poetry, sculpture, and installation. It is most often an interest in the spiritual, and the unknown that serve as basis for a diversity of studies and creations. From this starting point his works unfolds in different directions, in a process dedicated to both intuition and a contemplating immersion into the material. Silas Inoue (b. 1981, Denmark) currently lives and works in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is a graduate MA Visual Communication from The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts, School of Design in 2010. From 2008-2009 he studied at Jan Matejki, Academy of Fine Arts in Krakow Pl, and as a scholarship student at Osaka Seikei University, Faculty of Art and Design, Osaka JP in 2007-2008. www.silasinoue.com

name: HuskMitNavn - How to smoke a pipe in the rain
description: · Apx. 201 € · 6 color lithography on handmade, 300 gsm acid free paper. · Year 2013 · 50 cm x 70 cm · Edition of 200 · Signed and numbered by the artist DK HuskMitNavn har med sin humoristiske, kontroversielle og politiske street-art sat sit præg på både den danske og internationale kunstscene. Hans karakteristiske figurer og kommentarer er spredt over hele Europa og dækker over alt fra street-art og graffiti i det offentlige rum, illustrationer for internationale magasiner og aviser til udstillinger i gallerier og store bygningsdekorationer. UK HuskMitNavn (RememberMyName) lives and works in Copenhagen, Denmark. With his controversial, humorous and political street-art he has made his mark on both the Danish and the international art scene. His characteristic characters and comments are spread all over Europe and covers a wide area, from street-art and graffiti in public space, illustrations in international magazines and newspapers to established settings such as galleries and building adornments. www.huskmitnavn.dk

name: Morten Løfberg - Beatle
description: One color copper line etching on handmade Somerset, 300 gsm acid free paper. Paper size app: 27 cm x 32 cm Image size: 15 cm x 17,5 cm Black print = Edition of 15 Red print = Edition of 5 Purple print = Edition of 5 Printed at Niels Borch Jensen studio, Copenhagen. Signed and numbered by the artist. DK Kunstner og illustrator Morten Løfberg er uddannet serigraf og studerer på Medie- og Journalisthøjskolen i København. Han har illustreret flere bøger og er fast tilknyttet adskillige forlag i norden. Kuglepennen samt en betydelig portion humor, er de vigtigeste remedier i skabelsen af Løfbergs værker. Kuglepennens fine streger går godt i spænd med kobberraderingens tidskrævende håndværksmæssige udfordringer. Løfberg er desuden medstifter af det grafiske værksted Wood-cut. samt initiativtager til Goodbones - en årlig censureret udstilling for unge. UK Artist and illustrator Morten Løfberg is a trained screen printer and a student at The Danish School of Media and Journalism. He has illustrated quite a few books and is working on a regular basis with several Nordic publishers. Morten is using ballpoint pens as his primary tool and humour as the driving visual force, when working with his art. The use of ballpoint pens is translating perfectly to the demanding and time consuming work of a copper line etching. Further more Løfberg is the brain behind Goodbones - an annual censored exhibition for young artists and he is co-founder of Wood-cut, art printshop. Løfberg website

name: Jan S. Hansen - Abstract Sports
description: · Apx 174,00 € · 4 color screen print on heavyweight archival paper · 70 cm x 50 cm · Edition of 50 · Year 2013 · Signed and numbered by the artist · The edition was made as a part of Jans Show at IMO-Projects: "Abstract Sports Copenhagen March.15-April.27 2013. English Jan S. Hansen is a Danish born artist. He graduated from The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts in Copenhagen in the summer of 2010, where he was honoured with the Blix award. Jan works with painting, drawing, photo, collage and music. His work is a clash of ideas and visuals merged with fragmented poetry. With an off-beat humor and open riddling writings the works of Jan S. Hansen invites the viewer to participate through personal interpretation. Dansk Jan S. Hansen er uddannet fra det Kongelige Danske Kunstakademi i København, som han afsluttede i 2010, hvor han også modtog Blix prisen. Jan arbejder med oliemaling, tegning, fotografi og musik. Hans værker befinder sig i krydsfeltet mellem ideer, visuals og fragmenteret poesi. Med en off-beat humor og gådefulde skriverier opfordrer Jan S. Hansens værker beskueren til at deltage gennem en helt personlig fortolkning. www.janshansen.com

name: The Emperor Of Antarctica - Tartelet Multiverse
description: · Apx 33,00 € · Color offset print on gloss paper · 841 x 594 mm · Edition of 100 - no repress!!! · Unsigned English The Emperor of Antarctica is based in Bucharest, Romania. Blurring the boundaries between the ambiguity of fine art and the modern aestheticism of graphic design he works in multiple disciplines, but communicates his interests and obsessions coherently and consistently across a range of creative platforms. Taking on the twin role of graphic designer and artist, this versatile creative produces visual art best described as neutral yet intricate meditations on form and human perception. Dansk Danske The Emperor of Antarctica er bosat i Bukarest, Rumænien. I sit forsøg på at udfordre grænserne mellem klassisk kunst og moderne grafisk design skaber han sine værker på tværs af en lang række discipliner og kreative platforme. Med en dobbeltrolle som grafisk designer og mere traditionel kunstner producerer han visuel kunst, som bedst beskrives som afdæmpede men komplicerede meditationer over form og menneskelig sansning. www.emperorofantarctica.com

English The Emperor of Antarctica is based in Bucharest, Romania. Blurring the boundaries between the ambiguity of fine art and the modern aestheticism of graphic design he works in multiple disciplines, but communicates his interests and obsessions coherently and consistently across a range of creative platforms. Taking on the twin role of graphic designer and artist, this versatile creative produces visual art best described as neutral yet intricate meditations on form and human perception. name: Vibskov & Emenius - Section 6 A / The Circular Series
description: · Apx. 510,00 € · Double sided 5 color screen print on archival paper. · Print on both sides with paper cuts mounted in a deep special handmade wooden frame. · Every work is unique · 39 cm x 54 cm · Edition of 20 · Signed and numbered by the artists IMPORTANT: This art piece comes framed, and will be produced little by little. Therefore expect up to 14 days delivery time. · This work was made especially as a part of the exclusive collection by Limited Works entitled "LW INHOUSE EDITION". We invited a bunch of our favourite artists to work with our extremely talented printer Louise Drubigny. The exclusive collection was produced in Louises studios in Berlin using high quality water-based inks on heavy weight archival paper. Vibskov & Emenius is the collaborative art project of danish designer Henrik Vibskov and swedish artist Andreas Emenius, both graduates from Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design, London, in 2000. In 2007 they began work on 'The Fringe Projects' - ten works in form of installations, objects, performances, video and self-portraits, exploring illusion, surface, and movement, completed in 2009 All ten fringe projects, the production process including sketches and an essay by Hannah Heilmann, have been compiled in the book 'The Fringe Projects 1-10' (144p JapSam Books, 2009). For the first time, in Feb 2009, 'The Fringe Projects' were exhibited as a whole series at Zeeuws Museum in Middelburg, the Netherlands. (www.zeeuwsmuseum.nl) where Vibskov & Emenius had a dialogue with the rooms of the Museum and its unique cultural historic collection in a 'take-over' of the museum. The exhibition consist of the ten projects that make up 'The Fringe Projects' as well as three site specific works produced for the museum, including 'the Tapestry' which Zeeuws Museum has bought for their permanent collection. 'The Circular Series' is Vibskov & Emenius new series of artworks, which they begun work on in 2009. Like in their earlier collaboration 'The Fringe Projects' where the fringe is used formally, the circle is used as a clarifier, or visual glue, linking all the projects to the same universe. As a formal experiment the circle is interesting in relation to material, form, and motion. If you dig a little bit deeper, the Circular Series is about identity and inclusion, and about a persons place in the world, between fantasy, and self-made. www.vibskovemenius.com www.henrikvibskov.com www.andreasemenius.com

His works have been shown in galleries both in Denmark and abroad. Mathias is currently studying Visual Communication at the Danish School Of Media and Journalism. Dansk Mathias Malling Mortensen (også kendt som MAMAMO) arbejder primært med papirsklip. Gennem en omfattende og tidskrævende proces kommenterer Mathias' værker på begreber som kontrast og rum. name: Stine Tranekjær - It's Not That Easy To Die
description: · Apx. 107,00 € · 5 color screen print on heavyweight archival paper. · 70 cm x 50 cm · Edition of 40 · Signed and numbered by the artist · This work was made especially as a part of the exclusive collection by Limited Works entitled "LW INHOUSE EDITION". We invited a bunch of our favourite artists to work with our extremely talented printer Louise Drubigny. The exclusive collection was produced in Louises studios in Berlin using high quality water-based inks on heavy weight archival paper. Born in the city of Copenhagen, Denmark (1981). The silk-screened works by Stine B Tranekjær stand out by their poetic approach and their very rich and narrative relationship between colour and composition. These graphic works are printed from full size paper cut stencils. Mastering her technique with a pair of scissors to perfection, Stine B Tranekjær carries homage to Henri Matisse and his later works. In her work in general, Tranekjær has a strong but almost childlike take on human perception - in a seemingly naïve way she questions and approaches our fragility, every day habits and behaviours. Her passionate use of colour often seeks the boundaries of contrast and creates highly extrovert expressions. Stine B Tranekjær works in painting, drawings, graphic prints and collage. Works by Stine B Tranekjær has been selected for the Charlottenborg Spring Exhibition (2009) and she has been awarded by the Danish Arts Foundation (2011). www.stinetranekjaer.dk

Om kunstneren Silas Inoues virke omfatter tegning, maleri, poesi, skulptur og installation. Det er ofte interessen for det spirituelle og det ukendte som er udgangspunktet for hans værker. About the artist Silas Inoue´s oeuvre includes drawing, painting, poetry, sculpture, and installation. It is most often an interest in the spiritual, and the unknown that serve as basis for a diversity of studies and creations. From this starting point his works unfolds in different directions, in a process dedicated to both intuition and a contemplating immersion into the material. Silas Inoue (b. 1981, Denmark) currently lives and works in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is a graduate MA Visual Communication from The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts, School of Design in 2010. From 2008-2009 he studied at Jan Matejki, Academy of Fine Arts in Krakow Pl, and as a scholarship student at Osaka Seikei University, Faculty of Art and Design, Osaka JP in 2007-2008. www.silasinoue.com

name: Andreas Emenius - Future Head
description: · Apx. 147,00 € · 1 color screen print on heavy weight archival paper. · 50 cm x 70 cm · Edition of 50 · Signed and numbered by the artists Swedish born Emenius is a graduate of Central Saint Martins School of Art and Design, London, and today lives and works in Copenhagen, Denmark. Visualizing the pulsating energies given out by people and objects, to capture their gravity and movements, the intangible and the temporary by harnessing the dominant sensation in the whirlwind of modern life. His studies of the world are often translated into choreographed spatial 'situations' with ambiguous and fragmented narratives that takes in death, suburbia, ascension, threat, popular culture and science fiction. Andreas Emenius has been presented in various galleries in Stockholm, Copenhagen, London, Berlin and Tokyo. In institutions such as Zeeuws Museum in Holland, Kiyomizu-Dera Temple in Kyoto, Japan, Wilhelm Wagendfeld Haus in Bremen, Germany, The Textile Museum, Washington, USA, New Benaki Museum, Athens. As well as during the Curitiba Biennale, Brazil, in 2010 and the Gwangju Design Biennale in South Korea in 2011. With designer Henrik Vibskov he elaborated an on-going art project called 'The Circular Series' (One of which they begun to work on in 2009. Like in their earlier 'The Fringe Projects' collaboration, it works like an experiment, a conversation inside a formal framework, inspired by mankind's constant search for knowledge. Andreas Emenius staged and curated 'Movement', at H.C Andersen Castle, Copenhagen (2012). A total installation to be experienced during ten hours, with international artists in dialogue across the fields of painting, dance, performance and music. His latest solo exhibition is named 'Future Heads', (2012), at Jonas Kleerup Gallery, Stockholm (2012). Upcoming exhibitions include 'Circular Series, Section 7' (Vibskov&Emenius), Grand Humo, Belgium (2012), 'In case we don't die', Torrance Art Museum, Los Angeles, USA (2013) and 'The Situation', Schunck museum, Heleen, Holland (2013). He is an associative lecture at The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts, Copenhagen, and regulary makes guest lectures at various institutions, such as Hochschule für Künste, Bremen. www.andreasemenius.com www.vibskovemenius.com

English HuskMitNavn (RememberMyName) lives and works in Copenhagen, Denmark. With his controversial, humorous and political street-art he has made his mark on both the Danish and the international art scene. His characteristic characters and comments are spread all over Europe and covers a wide area, from street-art and graffiti in public space, illustrations in international magazines and newspapers to established settings such as galleries and building adornments. Dansk HuskMitNavn har med sin humoristiske, kontroversielle og politiske street-art sat sit præg på både den danske og internationale kunstscene . English Hvass&Hannibal is a multi-disciplinary arts and design studio based in Copenhagen. Since 2006, its founders, Nan Na Hvass & Sofie Hannibal have worked in close collaborative partnership with illustrative and conceptual design in a number of different fields for numerous clients in Europe, Asia and the US. Whether in the digital realm or on a three-dimensional scale, the studio takes projects from esoteric illustrative beginnings to a full art direction and graphic design solution, all in-house. As well as being image makers they have also directed high profile photographic projects, and created sets and costumes for amongst others, one of Denmark's famous musical successes of recent years – Efterklang. Dansk Hvass&Hannibal er et multidisciplinært kunst og designstudio, der residerer I København. Siden 2006 har grundlæggerne, Nan Na Hvass & Sofie Hannibal, arbejdet tæt sammen om illustrationer og conceptuelt design for en bred vifte af kunder fra både Europa, Asien og USA. Uanset om opgaverne er indenfor det digitale område eller på en tre-dimensional skala, løfter Hvass&Hannibal dem gennem hele processen, fra esoterisk skitse til komplet grafisk design løsning. Ud over deres arbejde som imagedesignere har Hvass&Hannibal styret højprofilerede fotoprojekter samt skabt scenografi og kostumer for blandt andre det danske successband Efterklang. www.hvasshannibal.dk

name: Victor Ash - Astronaut/Cosmonaut 2014
description: · Apx 215,00 € · 1 color screen print on 300 gsm bright white paper. · 70 cm x 100 cm · Edition of 200 · Signed and numbered by the artist · The almost photographic result is created with a super fine halftone. The image is a silk screen production of an iconic Berlin wall piece. You can see the original mural painting on the corner of Mariannen Straße and Skalitzer Straße in Berlin. ABOUT THE ARTIST Ash works mostly in the street and the works are ”in your face” and visible to everyone, also to those who have not actively sought them out. He says; “It’s very exciting for me as an artist to work in this way. When you’re placing a present like that in a public space, it creates an interaction with people you’d never talk to otherwise. It’s something you give to the people and making paintings outside like this, is a gift to the public.” In this sense his art is democratic and unavoidable and manifests itself in the form of public statements completely in line with the spirit of street art. www.victorash.net/

name: Thomas Pålsson - Brain
description: · Apx. 148,00 € · 1 color screen print on card stock · 100 cm x 70 cm · Edition of 15 · Signed and numbered by the artist Pålsson made this print for his solo show SUPREME MANIPULATOR at Raahuset, Copenhagen 2012. The show took its starting point in the great American propagandist Edward L. Bernays. English Thomas Pålsson (1980) is a Copenhagen born and based visual artist with a background in graffiti and music. He works with drawing, painting, mural production and self-publishing in various formats and in a wide range of projects. He graduated from the Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts, School of Design in 2007 and has been working, exhibiting and publishing independently since then. Dansk Thomas Pålsson (1980) er billedkunstner med baggrund i graffiti og musik og er født og bosat i København. Han arbejder med tegning, maleri, murmaleri og d.i.y publikationer i en lang række sammenhænge og projekter. Han er uddannet fra Kunstakademiets Designskole i 2007 og har siden da produceret, udstillet og udgivet sit materiale uafhængigt. www.leadthefools.com

name: Susann Pönisch & Marion Jdanoff - Shit
description: · Apx. 94 € · 1 color screen print on card stock · 70 cm x 50 cm · Edition of 20 · Signed and numbered by the artists English Susann Pönisch was born in 1979 and grew up in Berlin, Germany, where she lives today. In 2005 she began to screen and print her own drawings at the "Fleischerei", a free workspace for screen printing at the Rosenthaler Platz in Berlin. Since then screen-printing became her favourite technique. Today Pönisch produces her prints by drawing directly on transparent paper using several different techniques and tools, like acrylic paint, auqarell, coal, fineliner and many more. Pönischs prints are based on these drawings and there are no digital tools involved in producing the prints. Dansk Susann Poenisch blev født i 1979 i Berlin, hvor hun bor den dag i dag. I 2005 begyndte hun at trykke og printe sine tegninger på det frie arbejdsrum for print og tryk 'Fleischeri' på Rosenthaler Platz i Berlin. Siden har silketryk været hendes fortrukne teknik. Pönisch producerer sine tryk helt uden digitale værktøjer. Ved at tegne direkte på transparent papir, med en bred vifte af redskaber såsom akryl, akvarel, kul og mange flere, opnår hun en helt særlig stil. Susann Pönisch website Marion Jdanoff website

name: Frodo Mikkelsen - pig
description: · Apx. 175 € · 10 color lithography on heavyweight archival paper · 51 cm x 34,5 cm · Edition of 150 · Signed and numbered by the artist Dansk Frodo Mikkelsen (f. 1974) har markeret sig som en af samtidens fremtrædende unge kunstnere. Frodo Mikkelsen har en fortid som graffitimaler og denne baggrund fornægter sig ikke i hans værker, der alle tager udgangspunkt i graffitiens karakteristiske grafik. Men det grafisk forenklede formsprog trækker også tråde til popkunsten, ligesom hans motivverden baseres på genkendelige figurationer flettet ind i et næsten surrealistisk univers. Hans værker er farverige landskabsskildringer, hvor modsætninger mødes og morbide elementer som kranier og andre legemsdele placeres i idylliske omgivelser – altid med en stærk humoristisk undertone. Frodo Mikkelsens kunstneriske univers er mangfoldigt og forfriskende uforudsigeligt, hvilket også har medført en varm publikumsmodtagelse og fremragende anmeldelser. English Frodo Mikkelsen – Born in 1974. Frodo Lives and works in Copenhagen. Frodo has painted graffiti since 1984, and worked with art since 1990. From 1998 to 2000, he attended different art schools, among others; Thorstedlund, K.U.B.A and The Rigger loft. He had his debute at ‘Den Frie’ Centre of Contemporary Art’s fall exhibition in 2001. He preferentially works with paintings, but graphic art, the art of sculpture, Mail art, Street art, and Land art can be found in his repertoire as well. Frodo is a member of BKF (Danish Visual Artists) and DG (Danish Graphic Artists). www.frodomikkelsen.dk

name: Mikkel Møller (Dais) - Drawing with Sally 19
description: · Apx 160,00 € · Pen, Pencil and Marker on 130 g/m2 drawing paper · 40 cm x 30 cm · Original artwork · Signed by the artist · This work is part of a series of drawings, that Mikkel Møller did experimenting with different kinds of contrasts in strokes. In this particularly series, 1 year old Sally participated in her own unique way. English Mikkel Møller has a background in the Danish graffiti and street-art scene. But unlike the norm of this particular type of artist, he does not intend to establish a permanent and easily recognizable style. Quite contrary, He is much more inspired by expanding and combining different categories in his often conceptual and idea based approach. www.dais.dk Dansk Mikkel Møller har baggrund i graffiti og street-art miljøet. Men I modsætning normen for denne type af kunstnere, fokuserer han ikke på at etablere en fast og let genkendelig stil. Han bliver langt mere inspireret af at forsøge at udvide og blande kategorierne i hans ofte konceptuelle og idébårne tilgang til værkerne. www.dais.dk

name: Zven Balslev - Regression (Zine)
description: · Apx. 24 € · A4 · Edition of 88 · Colour art zine from Zven Balslevs Cult Pump Publishing. · Signed and Hand printed by the artist English Zven Balslev (b. 1977) is a graphic artist, cartoonist, musician and painter based in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is a graduate from The Danish National Academy of Art, and is internationally known for his work with the notorious and now defunct danish publishing house SMITTEKILDE. Zven works with drawing and various graphic techniques such as silkscreen, print, lino-cut, ink and white-out collages. His drawings have appeared on countless posters, flyer's and record covers in the Copenhagen underground, and in magazines like Mollüsk (Bongoût), Hopital Brut, The Sound Projector and La Commissure, among others. Dansk Zven Balslev er dansk grafisk designer, tegnerserietegner, musiker og maler. Han er uddannet fra Det Kongelige Danske Kunstakademi, og er internationalt anerkendt for sit arbejde med det notoriske og nu lukkede forlag SMITTEKILDE. Zven arbejder med tegning og forskellige grafiske teknikker såsom silketryk, linoleumstryk, blæk og collager. Hans tegninge har figureret på utallige plakater, flyers og pladecovers i den københavnske undergrund, i magasiner som bla. Mollüsk(Bongoût), Hospital Brut, The sound Projector and La Commissure. Cult Pump Blog

name: Zven Balslev - Regression (Zine+poster)
description: · Apx. 27 € · A4 · Limited edition of 100 · hand printed colour art zine from Zven Balslevs Cult Pump Publishing. · Includes double-sided poster · Hand numbered English Zven Balslev (b. 1977) is a graphic artist, cartoonist, musician and painter based in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is a graduate from The Danish National Academy of Art, and is internationally known for his work with the notorious and now defunct danish publishing house SMITTEKILDE. Zven works with drawing and various graphic techniques such as silkscreen, print, lino-cut, ink and white-out collages. His drawings have appeared on countless posters, flyer's and record covers in the Copenhagen underground, and in magazines like Mollüsk (Bongoût), Hopital Brut, The Sound Projector and La Commissure, among others. Dansk Zven Balslev er dansk grafisk designer, tegnerserietegner, musiker og maler. Han er uddannet fra Det Kongelige Danske Kunstakademi, og er internationalt anerkendt for sit arbejde med det notoriske og nu lukkede forlag SMITTEKILDE. Zven arbejder med tegning og forskellige grafiske teknikker såsom silketryk, linoleumstryk, blæk og collager. Hans tegninge har figureret på utallige plakater, flyers og pladecovers i den københavnske undergrund, i magasiner som bla. Mollüsk(Bongoût), Hospital Brut, The sound Projector and La Commissure. Cult Pump Blog

name: Robin Monies - Frame Works (green)
description: · Apx 133,00 € · 2 color screen print on card stock · 70 cm x 100 cm · Edition of 20 · Printed, signed and numbered by the artist English Born 1984 in Copenhagen, Denmark - lives and works in London. These screenprints are a natural divergens from Robins big scale, process based collage series, 'frameworks'. Initially begun as a kind of 'materialistic ecosystem' in Guangzhou/China. This series ponders arbitrary reasons for painting today utilizing discarted, forgotten, donated work, left behind by other artists. These prints are a further developed digital rendering of the collages. Printed by Robin at Slade School of Fine Art where he graduated 2012 Dansk Født i 1984 i København. Bor og arbejder i London. Disse silketryk er en naturlig afvigelse fra Robins store, dybt process orienterede, collage serie 'Frameworks'. Projektet startede som et materialistisk økosystem i Guangzhou/Kina, og serien beskæftiger sig med vilkårlige begrundelser for nutidens maleri. Værker er blevet doneret, fundet, byttet og købt er blevet dekonstrueret og stilarter/ udtryksformer underlagt samme dogma. Denne edition er en videreudviklet digital rendering af collagerne. Alt er printet i hånden af Robin selv på Slade School of Fine Arts hvor han demiterede 2012. WWW.ROBINMONIES.COM

name: Stine Tranekjær - Poste Restante / (To Be Called For)
description: · Apx. 100 € · 3 color screen print on heavyweight archival paper. · High pigment acrylic and gouache inks · 70 cm x 50 cm · Edition of 20, Series of 3 · Printed, signed and numbered by the artist Poste Restante is part of the Farewell series. The Farewell series was featured in the Charlottenborg Spring Exhibition 2013. Born in the city of Copenhagen, Denmark (1981). The silk-screened works by Stine B Tranekjær stand out by their poetic approach and their very rich and narrative relationship between colour and composition. These graphic works are printed from full size paper cut stencils. Mastering her technique with a pair of scissors to perfection, Stine B Tranekjær carries homage to Henri Matisse and his later works. In her work in general, Tranekjær has a strong but almost childlike take on human perception - in a seemingly naïve way she questions and approaches our fragility, every day habits and behaviours. Her passionate use of colour often seeks the boundaries of contrast and creates highly extrovert expressions. Stine B Tranekjær works in painting, drawings, graphic prints and collage. Works by Stine B Tranekjær has been selected for the Charlottenborg Spring Exhibition (2009 and 2013) and she has been awarded by the Danish Arts Foundation (2011). www.stinetranekjaer.dk

name: Susann Pönisch - Ohne Titel
description: · Apx. 87 € · 4 color screen print on card stock · 41,5 cm x 29 cm · Edition of 19 · Signed and numbered by the artist English Susann Pönisch was born in 1979 and grew up in Berlin, Germany, where she lives today. In 2005 she began to screen and print her own drawings at the "Fleischerei", a free workspace for screen printing at the Rosenthaler Platz in Berlin. Since then screen-printing became her favourite technique. Today Pönisch produces her prints by drawing directly on transparent paper using several different techniques and tools, like acrylic paint, auqarell, coal, fineliner and many more. Pönischs prints are based on these drawings and there are no digital tools involved in producing the prints. Dansk Susann Poenisch blev født i 1979 i Berlin, hvor hun bor den dag i dag. I 2005 begyndte hun at trykke og printe sine tegninger på det frie arbejdsrum for print og tryk 'Fleischeri' på Rosenthaler Platz i Berlin. Siden har silketryk været hendes fortrukne teknik. Pönisch producerer sine tryk helt uden digitale værktøjer. Ved at tegne direkte på transparent papir, med en bred vifte af redskaber såsom akryl, akvarel, kul og mange flere, opnår hun en helt særlig stil. www.susannpoenisch.blogspot.com

name: Thomas Pålsson - Dog
description: · Apx. 148,00 € · 1 color screen print on card stock · 100 cm x 70 cm · Edition of 15 · Signed and numbered by the artist Pålsson made this print for his solo show SUPREME MANIPULATOR at Raahuset, Copenhagen 2012. The show took its starting point in the great American propagandist Edward L. Bernays. English Thomas Pålsson (1980) is a Copenhagen born and based visual artist with a background in graffiti and music. He works with drawing, painting, mural production and self-publishing in various formats and in a wide range of projects. He graduated from the Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts, School of Design in 2007 and has been working, exhibiting and publishing independently since then. Dansk Thomas Pålsson (1980) er billedkunstner med baggrund i graffiti og musik og er født og bosat i København. Han arbejder med tegning, maleri, murmaleri og d.i.y publikationer i en lang række sammenhænge og projekter. Han er uddannet fra Kunstakademiets Designskole i 2007 og har siden da produceret, udstillet og udgivet sit materiale uafhængigt. www.leadthefools.com

name: Jan S. Hansen - Butterfly
description: · Apx 174,00 € · 4 color screen print on heavyweight archival paper · 70 cm x 50 cm · Edition of 42 · Signed and numbered by the artist · This work was made especially as a part of the exclusive collection by Limited Works entitled "LW INHOUSE EDITION". We invited a bunch of our favourite artists to work with our extremely talented printer Louise Drubigny. The exclusive collection was produced in Louises studios in Berlin using high quality water-based inks on heavy weight archival paper. English Jan S. Hansen is a Danish born artist. He graduated from The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts in Copenhagen in the summer of 2010, where he was honoured with the Blix award. Jan works with painting, drawing, photo, collage and music. His work is a clash of ideas and visuals merged with fragmented poetry. With an off-beat humor and open riddling writings the works of Jan S. Hansen invites the viewer to participate through personal interpretation. Dansk Jan S. Hansen er uddannet fra det Kongelige Danske Kunstakademi i København, som han afsluttede i 2010, hvor han også modtog Blix prisen. Jan arbejder med oliemaling, tegning, fotografi og musik. Hans værker befinder sig i krydsfeltet mellem ideer, visuals og fragmenteret poesi. Med en off-beat humor og gådefulde skriverier opfordrer Jan S. Hansens værker beskueren til at deltage gennem en helt personlig fortolkning. www.janshansen.com

name: Frodo Mikkelsen - Rabbit Cowboy
description: · Apx. 108 € · 7 color lithography on heavy weight archival paper · 30,5 cm x 40,5 cm · Edition of 230 · Signed and numbered by the artist Dansk Frodo Mikkelsen (f. 1974) har markeret sig som en af samtidens fremtrædende unge kunstnere. Frodo Mikkelsen har en fortid som graffitimaler og denne baggrund fornægter sig ikke i hans værker, der alle tager udgangspunkt i graffitiens karakteristiske grafik. Men det grafisk forenklede formsprog trækker også tråde til popkunsten, ligesom hans motivverden baseres på genkendelige figurationer flettet ind i et næsten surrealistisk univers. Hans værker er farverige landskabsskildringer, hvor modsætninger mødes og morbide elementer som kranier og andre legemsdele placeres i idylliske omgivelser – altid med en stærk humoristisk undertone. Frodo Mikkelsens kunstneriske univers er mangfoldigt og forfriskende uforudsigeligt, hvilket også har medført en varm publikumsmodtagelse og fremragende anmeldelser. English Frodo Mikkelsen – Born in 1974. Frodo Lives and works in Copenhagen. Frodo has painted graffiti since 1984, and worked with art since 1990. From 1998 to 2000, he attended different art schools, among others; Thorstedlund, K.U.B.A and The Rigger loft. He had his debute at ‘Den Frie’ Centre of Contemporary Art’s fall exhibition in 2001. He preferentially works with paintings, but graphic art, the art of sculpture, Mail art, Street art, and Land art can be found in his repertoire as well. Frodo is a member of BKF (Danish Visual Artists) and DG (Danish Graphic Artists). www.frodomikkelsen.dk

Today Pönisch produces her prints by drawing directly on transparent paper using several different techniques and tools, like acrylic paint, auqarell, coal, fineliner and many more. Pönischs prints are based on these drawings and there are no digital tools involved in producing the prints. Dansk Susann Poenisch blev født i 1979 i Berlin, hvor hun bor den dag i dag. I 2005 begyndte hun at trykke og printe sine tegninger på det frie arbejdsrum for print og tryk 'Fleischeri' på Rosenthaler Platz i Berlin. Siden har silketryk været hendes fortrukne teknik. Pönisch producerer sine tryk helt uden digitale værktøjer. Ved at tegne direkte på transparent papir, med en bred vifte af redskaber såsom akryl, akvarel, kul og mange flere, opnår hun en helt særlig stil. www.susannpoenisch.blogspot.com

name: Frodo Mikkelsen - Book: Sølv
description: · Apx. 67 € · Boxed artist book · Limited edition of 100 signed copies with a nice signed handprinted silk screen work for your wall. Dansk Frodo Mikkelsen (f. 1974) har markeret sig som en af samtidens fremtrædende unge kunstnere. Frodo Mikkelsen har en fortid som graffitimaler og denne baggrund fornægter sig ikke i hans værker, der alle tager udgangspunkt i graffitiens karakteristiske grafik. Men det grafisk forenklede formsprog trækker også tråde til popkunsten, ligesom hans motivverden baseres på genkendelige figurationer flettet ind i et næsten surrealistisk univers. Hans værker er farverige landskabsskildringer, hvor modsætninger mødes og morbide elementer som kranier og andre legemsdele placeres i idylliske omgivelser – altid med en stærk humoristisk undertone. Frodo Mikkelsens kunstneriske univers er mangfoldigt og forfriskende uforudsigeligt, hvilket også har medført en varm publikumsmodtagelse og fremragende anmeldelser. English Frodo Mikkelsen – Born in 1974. Frodo Lives and works in Copenhagen. Frodo has painted graffiti since 1984, and worked with art since 1990. From 1998 to 2000, he attended different art schools, among others; Thorstedlund, K.U.B.A and The Rigger loft. He had his debute at ‘Den Frie’ Centre of Contemporary Art’s fall exhibition in 2001. He preferentially works with paintings, but graphic art, the art of sculpture, Mail art, Street art, and Land art can be found in his repertoire as well. Frodo is a member of BKF (Danish Visual Artists) and DG (Danish Graphic Artists). www.frodomikkelsen.dk

name: Monkey - Fish Tea
description: · Apx 114 € · 3 color screen print on card stock · 50cm x 71 cm · Edition of 40 · Signed and numbered by the artist English Berlin based artist Monkey has been working with screenprints since 1998. He has been active in several underground workshops, including the legendary Fleischerei in Torstrasse. Today he is a part of MehrSiebdruck collective and studio. There are seven artists involved in the MehrSiebdruck project, working with original designs on paper and textiles. All their prints are hand made. Dansk Monkey arbejder fra Berlin hvor han har beskæftiget sig med tryk siden 1998. Han aktiv i adskillige undergrunds workshops som blandt andre tæller det legendariske Fleichrei i Torstrasse. I dag deltager han i MehrSiebdruck, der både er et kollektiv og et værksted. MehrSiebdruck køres af syv kunstnere der arbejder med originale design på papir og tekstil. Alle deres tryk er håndlavede. www.mehrsiebdruck.com/ www.mehrsiebdruck.com/

name: Hvass & Hannibal - Transitions
description: · Apx. 100,00 € · 4 color screen print on 200 gsm uncoated stock. · 64 cm × 46 cm · Edition of 40 · Signed and numbered by the artists English Hvass&Hannibal is a multi-disciplinary arts and design studio based in Copenhagen. Since 2006, its founders, Nan Na Hvass & Sofie Hannibal have worked in close collaborative partnership with illustrative and conceptual design in a number of different fields for numerous clients in Europe, Asia and the US. Whether in the digital realm or on a three-dimensional scale, the studio takes projects from esoteric illustrative beginnings to a full art direction and graphic design solution, all in-house. As well as being image makers they have also directed high profile photographic projects, and created sets and costumes for amongst others, one of Denmark's famous musical successes of recent years – Efterklang. Dansk Hvass&Hannibal er et multidisciplinært kunst og designstudio, der residerer I København. Siden 2006 har grundlæggerne, Nan Na Hvass & Sofie Hannibal, arbejdet tæt sammen om illustrationer og conceptuelt design for en bred vifte af kunder fra både Europa, Asien og USA. Uanset om opgaverne er indenfor det digitale område eller på en tre-dimensional skala, løfter Hvass&Hannibal dem gennem hele processen, fra esoterisk skitse til komplet grafisk design løsning. Ud over deres arbejde som imagedesignere har Hvass&Hannibal styret højprofilerede fotoprojekter samt skabt scenografi og kostumer for blandt andre det danske successband Efterklang. www.hvasshannibal.dk/

name: Inka Järvinen - Going Up
description: · Apx 107,00 € · 2 color screen print on heavyweight archival paper. · 70 cm x 50 cm · Edition of 40 · Signed and numbered by the artist · This work was made especially as a part of the exclusive collection by Limited Works entitled "LW INHOUSE EDITION". We invited a bunch of our favourite artists to work with our extremely talented printer Louise Drubigny. The exclusive collection was produced in Louises studios in Berlin using high quality water-based inks on heavy weight archival paper. English Inka Järvinen is a Helsinki based illustrator and one of the founding partners of the graphic design agency TSTO. Järvinen has graduated from the University of Art and Design Helsinki both from the department of Fashion design and Graphic design. She mainly works with dark and detailed collages that draw inspiration from the sci-fi movies, posters and futuristic images of 1960s and 70s pop culture. Dansk Inka Järvinen er illustrator med fast base i Helsinki og en af grundlæggerne af det grafiske design bureau TSTO. Järvinen holder en grad fra Helsinki Universitet for Kunst og Design i både mode design og grafisk design. Hun arbejder fortrinsvis med mørke og detaljerede collager, der trækker på inspiration fra sci-fi film, plakater og andre futuristiske billeder fra 60'er og 70'ernes popkultur. www.pekkafinland.fi www.tsto.org

name: Zven Balslev - Neo Wow!
description: · Apx. 48 € · 5 color screen print on card stock · 36,5 cm x 52 cm · Limited edition · Signed by the artist English Zven Balslev (b. 1977) is a graphic artist, cartoonist, musician and painter based in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is a graduate from The Danish National Academy of Art, and is internationally known for his work with the notorious and now defunct danish publishing house SMITTEKILDE. Zven works with drawing and various graphic techniques such as silkscreen, print, lino-cut, ink and white-out collages. His drawings have appeared on countless posters, flyer's and record covers in the Copenhagen underground, and in magazines like Mollüsk (Bongoût), Hopital Brut, The Sound Projector and La Commissure, among others. Dansk Zven Balslev er dansk grafisk designer, tegnerserietegner, musiker og maler. Han er uddannet fra Det Kongelige Danske Kunstakademi, og er internationalt anerkendt for sit arbejde med det notoriske og nu lukkede forlag SMITTEKILDE. Zven arbejder med tegning og forskellige grafiske teknikker såsom silketryk, linoleumstryk, blæk og collager. Hans tegninge har figureret på utallige plakater, flyers og pladecovers i den københavnske undergrund, i magasiner som bla. Mollüsk(Bongoût), Hospital Brut, The sound Projector and La Commissure. www.cultpump.blogspot.com

Hans værker er farverige landskabsskildringer, hvor modsætninger mødes og morbide elementer som kranier og andre legemsdele placeres i idylliske omgivelser – altid med en stærk humoristisk undertone. Frodo Mikkelsens kunstneriske univers er mangfoldigt og forfriskende uforudsigeligt, hvilket også har medført en varm publikumsmodtagelse og fremragende anmeldelser. www.frodomikkelsen.dk

English Frodo Mikkelsen – Born in 1974. Frodo Lives and works in Copenhagen. Frodo has painted graffiti since 1984, and worked with art since 1990. From 1998 to 2000, he attended different art schools, among others; Thorstedlund, K.U.B.A and The Rigger loft. He had his debute at ‘Den Frie’ Centre of Contemporary Art’s fall exhibition in 2001. He preferentially works with paintings, but graphic art, the art of sculpture, Mail art, Street art, and Land art can be found in his repertoire as well. name: Smike Käszner – Maps of Germany
description: · Apx. 94 € · 1 color litography on heavy weight archival paper · 21 cm x 47 cm · Edition of 28 · Signed, stamped and numbered by the artist Dansk Den gamle sætning fra Det Kongelige Teaters store tæppe, Ej Blot til Lyst, passer til Smike Käszners verden. Hans kunst er en løbende undersøgelse i samtidens tåbeligheder, idiosynkrasier, fordomme... Og helst på samme tid. Med en knivskarp iagttagelse skærer han stykker ud af samtiden, som var det en døende fed ko. Dernæst steger, koger og snitter han stykkerne og kaster dem tilbage til sit måbende publikum. Politisk korrekthed er ikke en størrelse som bremser ham. English A reoccurring theme in Smike Käszner’s work is that of memento mori. Remember time is limited. In Smike’s mind time can be expanded if space is limited and vice versa. How much experiences can be put into a life – while still keeping a balance between time and space? How do we come yet closer to the question, of what we at the end of the day will regret we didn’t do? Smike fans out his questions to involve events, graphic work, paintings, writing and video. www.smike.dk

name: Zven Balslev - Yoda
description: ·Apx 430,00 € ·4 color litography on heavyweight archival paper ·55,5 cm x 71,5 cm ·Edition of 26 ·Signed and numbered by the artist English Zven Balslev (b. 1977) is a graphic artist, cartoonist, musician and painter based in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is a graduate from The Danish National Academy of Art, and is internationally known for his work with the notorious and now defunct danish publishing house SMITTEKILDE. Zven works with drawing and various graphic techniques such as silkscreen, print, lino-cut, ink and white-out collages. His drawings have appeared on countless posters, flyer's and record covers in the Copenhagen underground, and in magazines like Mollüsk (Bongoût), Hopital Brut, The Sound Projector and La Commissure among others. Dansk Zven Balslev er dansk grafisk designer, tegnerserietegner, musiker og maler. Han er uddannet fra Det Kongelige Danske Kunstakademi, og er internationalt anerkendt for sit arbejde med det notoriske og nu lukkede forlag SMITTEKILDE. Zven arbejder med tegning og forskellige grafiske teknikker herunder silketryk, linoleumstryk, blæk og collager. Hans tegninger har figureret på utallige plakater, flyers og pladecovers i den københavnske undergrund. I magasiner som bla. Mollüsk (Bongoût), Hospital Brut, The sound Projector og La Commissure. www.cultpump.blogspot.com

name: Christian Falsnaes - http://youtu.be/iVP1bzdNBLQ
description: · Apx 134,00 € · 2 color screen print on heavyweight archival paper. · 70 cm x 50 cm · Edition of 40 · Signed and numbered by the artist Why such a wierd title? Actually the title is a YouTube web address. Click it and get the background story about this art print · This work was made especially as a part of the exclusive collection by Limited Works entitled "LW INHOUSE EDITION". We invited a bunch of our favourite artists to work with our extremely talented printer Louise Drubigny. The exclusive collection was produced in Louises studios in Berlin using high quality water-based inks on heavy weight archival paper. http://youtu.be/iVP1bzdNBLQ English Christian Falsnaes is a danish born artist based in Vienna, Switzerland. Before graduating form the Academy of fine arts in Vienna, Falsnaes studied Philosophy at the University of Copenhagen and participated ferociously in the graffiti and squatting scenes of Copenhagen. Falsnaes' main artistic focus lies within the field of performance art. His general artistic concern explores the barriers between pop culture and elitist thinking. The approach being to mirror the conceptions of various social interaction, exaggerate them and thus expose an underlying absurdity. Christian Falsnaes is represented by Rhode Contemporary. Dansk Christian Falsnaes er danskfødt kunstner bosat i Schweiz, hvor han tog sin uddannelse fra Kunstakademiet i Wien. Inden han påbegyndte sin kunstuddannelse studerede Falsnaes filosofi ved Københavns Universitet. København dannede også den primære ramme for hans engagement i graffiti og squatting bevægelserne frem til hans optagelse på Kunstakademiet i Wien. Falsnaes' primære fokus er performancekunsten. Hans overordnede retning går mod at udfordre grænserne mellem højkultur og popkultur. Tilgangen er spejling af en række sociale konventioner, som udfordres gennem overdrivelse og således drager et absurd element frem i vores forståelse af hverdagen. Christian Falsnaes er repræsenteret af Rode Contemporary www.falsnaes.com

name: Vibskov & Emenius - Section 6 B / The Circular Series
description: · Apx. 510,00 € · Double sided 5 color screen print on archival paper. · Print on both sides with paper cuts mounted in a deep special handmade wooden frame. · Every work is unique · 39 cm x 54 cm · Edition of 20 · Signed and numbered by the artists · This work was made especially as a part of the exclusive collection by Limited Works entitled "LW INHOUSE EDITION". We invited a bunch of our favourite artists to work with our extremely talented printer Louise Drubigny. The exclusive collection was produced in Louises studios in Berlin using high quality water-based inks on heavy weight archival paper. IMPORTANT: This art piece comes framed, and will be produced little by little. Therefore expect up to 14 days delivery time. Vibskov & Emenius Vibskov & Emenius is the collaborative art project of danish designer Henrik Vibskov and swedish artist Andreas Emenius, both graduates from Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design, London, in 2000. In 2007 they began work on 'The Fringe Projects' - ten works in form of installations, objects, performances, video and self-portraits, exploring illusion, surface, and movement, completed in 2009 All ten fringe projects, the production process including sketches and an essay by Hannah Heilmann, have been compiled in the book 'The Fringe Projects 1-10' (144p JapSam Books, 2009). For the first time, in Feb 2009, 'The Fringe Projects' were exhibited as a whole series at Zeeuws Museum in Middelburg, the Netherlands. (www.zeeuwsmuseum.nl) where Vibskov & Emenius had a dialogue with the rooms of the Museum and its unique cultural historic collection in a 'take-over' of the museum. The exhibition consist of the ten projects that make up 'The Fringe Projects' as well as three site specific works produced for the museum, including 'the Tapestry' which Zeeuws Museum has bought for their permanent collection. 'The Circular Series' is Vibskov & Emenius new series of artworks, which they begun work on in 2009. Like in their earlier collaboration 'The Fringe Projects' where the fringe is used formally, the circle is used as a clarifier, or visual glue, linking all the projects to the same universe. As a formal experiment the circle is interesting in relation to material, form, and motion. If you dig a little bit deeper, the Circular Series is about identity and inclusion, and about a persons place in the world, between fantasy, and self-made. www.vibskovemenius.com www.henrikvibskov.com www.andreasemenius.com

name: So:ren Berner - LUXURIA - Seven Deadly Sins Series
description: ·Apx. 87,00 € ·1 color screen print on paper. ·50 cm x 70 cm ·Edition of 14 in a series of 7 different motives. ·Signed and numbered by the artist The prints was made as a part of one of So:rens performances. Have a look HERE English So:ren Berner has been performing and exhibiting since 2001, when he did his first performance. He is working somewhere in the cross field between visual art, performance, music, urban activism and philosophy. So:rens career started as a graffiti artist in the 90’s but soon developed into combining various print and spray techniques with streetart and performances. His works have among other places been shown at Cabaret Voltaire, Zürich, MAK, Vienna, Istanbul Biennial,Turkey, W139, Amsterdam, Kunstraum Walcheturm, Zürich, Selfservice Artspace, Stuttgart, Helmhaus Musum, Zürich. At the Helmhaus Museum he was awarded the Helmhaus Grant for his exhibtion and performance in July 2011. So:ren also works as lecturer at F+F Schule für Kunst und Mediendesign in Zürich and is a regular guest teacher at the University of Arts in Bern ( HKB – Hochschule der Künste Bern). Dansk So:ren Berner har udstillet og performet siden sin første performance I 2001. Hans kunst udspiller sig i krydsfeltet mellem visuel kunst, performance, musik, aktivisme og filosofi. So:rens karriere begyndte som graffitimaler I 90’erne, men udviklede sig hurtigt til at inddrage alternative sprayteknikker, som han blandede med streetart og performancekunst. So:rens værker er blandt andet blevet vist i Cabaret Voltaire, Zürich, MAK, Wien, Istanbul Biennial,Turkey, W139, Amsterdam, Kunstraum Walcheturm, Zürich, Selfservice Artspace, Stuttgart, Helmhaus Musum, Zürich. På Helmhaus Museet blev han tildelt Helmhaus Grant for sin udstilling og performance I juli 2011. So:ren arbejder som lærer på F+F Schule für Kunst und Mediendesign i Zürich og er fast gæstelærer på Kunstakademiet i Bern ( HKB – Hochschule der Künste Bern). www.sorenberner.com/

name: Hvass & Hannibal - Loosing The Plot
description: · Apx. 100,00 € · 2 color screen print on 200 gsm uncoated stock. · 64 cm × 46 cm · Edition of 50 · Signed and numbered by the artists English Hvass&Hannibal is a multi-disciplinary arts and design studio based in Copenhagen. Since 2006, its founders, Nan Na Hvass & Sofie Hannibal have worked in close collaborative partnership with illustrative and conceptual design in a number of different fields for numerous clients in Europe, Asia and the US. Whether in the digital realm or on a three-dimensional scale, the studio takes projects from esoteric illustrative beginnings to a full art direction and graphic design solution, all in-house. As well as being image makers they have also directed high profile photographic projects, and created sets and costumes for amongst others, one of Denmark's famous musical successes of recent years – Efterklang. Dansk Hvass&Hannibal er et multidisciplinært kunst og designstudio, der residerer I København. Siden 2006 har grundlæggerne, Nan Na Hvass & Sofie Hannibal, arbejdet tæt sammen om illustrationer og conceptuelt design for en bred vifte af kunder fra både Europa, Asien og USA. Uanset om opgaverne er indenfor det digitale område eller på en tre-dimensional skala, løfter Hvass&Hannibal dem gennem hele processen, fra esoterisk skitse til komplet grafisk design løsning. Ud over deres arbejde som imagedesignere har Hvass&Hannibal styret højprofilerede fotoprojekter samt skabt scenografi og kostumer for blandt andre det danske successband Efterklang. www.hvasshannibal.dk/
